ba4071f6774a2ab240","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://bb94a8a2253f2e4a48340ead8c89bb91ea73e54012640177b6c77c53f4ca4e55","dweb:/ipfs/QmNwsLWzjRr3rrE5jDsSDVyfkbWs9FwcbAFsDhZ8frg2Ae"]}},"version":1}

addAllowedToken(address).details: Adds a token to the allowed tokens list (only owner)

params._tokenAddress: Address of the token to add

bytes32ToString(bytes32).details: Converts a bytes32 to a string (helper function for frontends)

params._tokenAddress: Address of token (address(0) for native ETH)

deposit(uint256).details: Allows a user to deposit native ETH toward a specific milestone

depositToken(uint256,uint256).details: Allows a user to deposit ERC20 tokens toward a specific milestone

emergencyWithdraw(uint256).details: Allows emergency withdrawal from an active milestone with penalty

getMilestoneCount(address).details: Returns the number of milestones for a user

returns.currentAmount: Current amount saved for the milestone
returns.name: Name of the milestone (as bytes32)

getUserTokenSavings(address,address).details: Returns user's total savings in a specific token

params._tokenAddress: Address of the token (address(0) for native ETH)

returns._0: Total savings in the specified token

isTokenAllowed(address).details: Checks if a token is allowed

params._tokenAddress: Address of the token to check

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

removeAllowedToken(address).details: Removes a token from the allowed tokens list (only owner)

params._tokenAddress: Address of the token to remove

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setMinSavingsAmount(uint256).details: Updates the minimum savings amount (only owner)

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdraw(uint256).details: Allows user to withdraw funds from a completed milestone

params._milestoneId: ID of the milestone to withdraw from
